People.name: Mitch Moreland
People.description: Mitchell Austin Moreland (born September 6, 1985) is a professional baseball first baseman who plays for the Texas Rangers.

People.name: John Ross
People.description: John Ross is a comic book artist who lives and works in the UK.

People.name: Christiana Oxenstierna
People.description: Christiana Juliana Oxenstierna (23 September 1661 – 27 February 1701) was a Swedish noble

People.name: Gust Stemmler
People.description: Gust L. Stemmler (December 10, 1899 – November 1986) is a former Democratic member of the Pennsylvania House of Representatives.

People.name: Stuart Still
People.description: Stuart John Still (born 14 December 1957) is a former English cricketer. Still was a right-handed batsman who bowled right-arm medium pace.
